<<<<<<< HEAD
Choice new songs, never before printed set to several new tunes by the best masters of music / written by Tho. D'Urfey. D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723. Playford, John, 1623-1686?
1 score ([2], 21 p.)
Printed by John Playford for Joseph Hindmarsh, London : 1684.
For voice and unfigured bass. Songs by Abell, Ackroyde, Draghi, Farmer, Grabu, King, Paisible, and anonymous. Cf. Day and Murrie. Songbooks. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

1 score ([2], 21 p.)
Printed by John Playford for Joseph Hindmarsh, London : 1684.
For voice and unfigured bass. Songs by Abell, Ackroyde, Draghi, Farmer, Grabu, King, Paisible, and anonymous. Cf. Day and Murrie. Songbooks. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
